statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE player_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions;
SELECT player_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_purchases WHERE item_price > 10;
SELECT player_id, item_name, item_price FROM player_purchases WHERE item_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS purchase_count FROM player_purchases GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(item_price) AS avg_price FROM player_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING avg_price < 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING avg_transaction_amount > 50 ORDER BY avg_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_transactions;
SELECT player_id, amount, transaction_date FROM player_transactions WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT purchase_id, item_name, price FROM player_purchases ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT player_id, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction_date FROM player_transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM player_transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, item_name, price FROM player_purchases WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE item_name = 'sword' AND quantity > 0;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_date, amount FROM player_transactions WHERE player_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT player_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_type='armor';
SELECT player_name, item_name, purchase_date FROM players JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id JOIN items ON purchases.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC, join_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_price FROM items WHERE item_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY item_price ASC;

SELECT player_name, item_name, purchase_date FROM players JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id JOIN items ON purchases.item_id = items.item_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_purchases > 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level < 3 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE developer = 'Nintendo' AND release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT game_name, release_date, developer FROM games ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT game_name, developer FROM games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY game_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id, game_id HAVING total_amount > 100;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'weapon' ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name;
